content: > **multibuy coupon codes** > > any 2 patterns 35% off - buy2get35 > > any 3 patterns 40% off - buy3get40 > > any 4 patterns 45% off - buy4get45 > > any 5 patterns 40% off - buy5get50 **granny s tipple pocket shawl** by catherine mclennan lullaby lodge designs the granny s tipple pocket shawl is a cozy stylish wrap designed for a soft relaxed texture worked in the drunken granny stitch this shawl features large comfy pockets and is finished with neat ribbing at the ends it is a simple comforting project that is perfect for beginners or anyone looking for a quick satisfying make **pattern details** **difficulty ** beginner-friendly **terminology ** us terms uk terms included **special stitches ** drunken granny cluster and slip_stitch 2 together **video tutorial ** a video tutorial link is included in the pattern for additional guidance **materials** **hook ** 6 00 mm **yarn ** yarnsmiths freespirit aran 100% acrylic 185m/202yd per 100g or any aran/worsted weight yarn **recommended substitutions ** sirdar jewelspun brava tweed or king cole crescendo aran **other items ** yarn needle and scissors **gauge** 2 25 drunken granny clusters x 5 row = 10cm 4in **sizing & yardage** the pattern includes two versatile sizes to suit different body shapes **size s/m/l** **width ** 37 cm 14 5 in **length ** 152 165 cm 60 65 in **yarn required ** 5 balls / 801 m 876 yd **size xl+** **width ** 46 cm 18 in **length ** 165 178 cm 65 70 in **yarn required ** 5 balls / 923 m 1010 yd © 2026 catherine mclennan lullaby lodge designs all rights reserved
